[#Increase your Sales with your Socials]
[@language:en]
[##Improve your social media skills]
[@coverImage:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/bit-books/sensaletion/sensaletion_upsell/web-resources/images/sensaletion_upsell_cover.png]

bit.title: Increase your Sales with your Socials
bit.subtitle: Improve your social media skills

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294536]
**As an entrepreneur, you cannot skip social media. No matter what business you are in, or how big your organization is, social media is key to engaging your target audience.**

bit.body: **As an entrepreneur, you cannot skip social media. No matter what business you are in, or how big your organization is, social media is key to engaging your target audience.**

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294537]
**Therefore, this white paper will Increase your Sales by Improving your Social media Skills.**

bit.body: **Therefore, this white paper will Increase your Sales by Improving your Social media Skills.**

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294538]
**Topics being discussed are brand awareness, engaging your audience, familiarity with your brand, the five C’s, social platforms, social content, your content calendar, and personal branding.**

bit.body: **Topics being discussed are brand awareness, engaging your audience, familiarity with your brand, the five C’s, social platforms, social content, your content calendar, and personal branding.**

bitmark:
[.chapter]
[@id:294539]
[▼ch-1]
[#Familiarity]

[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294540]
The key to success on social media is familiarity.

bit.body: The key to success on social media is familiarity.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294541]
People are more likely to engage with you if they are familiar with you. The lack of familiarity is the source of so many objections. It's much more difficult for people to trust you when they don't know you.

bit.body: People are more likely to engage with you if they are familiar with you. The lack of familiarity is the source of so many objections. It's much more difficult for people to trust you when they don't know you.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294542]
You must directly invest in raising awareness of your name, your area of expertise, and your reputation if you want to increase familiarity.

bit.body: You must directly invest in raising awareness of your name, your area of expertise, and your reputation if you want to increase familiarity.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294543]
In order for people to regularly see you and eventually feel more comfortable around you, you must be active and consistent on social media.

bit.body: In order for people to regularly see you and eventually feel more comfortable around you, you must be active and consistent on social media.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294544]
Engaging involves posting relevant content, liking, commenting, and sharing other people's posts that are relevant to your target prospects and customers.

bit.body: Engaging involves posting relevant content, liking, commenting, and sharing other people's posts that are relevant to your target prospects and customers.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--&image]
[@id:294545]
[&image:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/bit-books/sensaletion/sensaletion_upsell/web-resources/images/sensaletion_upsell_1.png][@width:1036]

[.chapter]
[@id:294546]
[▼ch-2]
[#The Five C's]

[.article:bitmark--&image]
[@id:294547]
[&image:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/bit-books/sensaletion/sensaletion_upsell/web-resources/images/sensaletion_upsell_2.png][@width:1600]

[.article:bitmark++]
[@id:294548]
To increase familiarity and build your personal brand, you must invest in the five C's.

•1 Conversion
•1 Consistency
•1 Connection
•1 Curation
•1 Creation

bit.body:
To increase familiarity and build your personal brand, you must invest in the five C's.

•1 Conversion
•1 Consistency
•1 Connection
•1 Curation
•1 Creation

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294549]
These five C's will help you generate an engaged audience and ultimately increase your sales and income.

bit.body: These five C's will help you generate an engaged audience and ultimately increase your sales and income.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294550]
[%][%Conversion]
To generate inbound leads (the best!) you want to publish relevant content and post thoughtful comments that position you as the expert, which can prompt prospects to contact you for more information.

bit.body: To generate inbound leads (the best!) you want to publish relevant content and post thoughtful comments that position you as the expert, which can prompt prospects to contact you for more information.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294551]
An additional strategy is to actively share links to white papers, ebooks, reports, and more that require leads to enter contact information.

bit.body: An additional strategy is to actively share links to white papers, ebooks, reports, and more that require leads to enter contact information.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294552]
[%][%Consistency]
Consistency is crucial. Algorithms reward consistency. The more consistent your activity, the more likely your posts will be moved to the top of feeds, gaining you more views and attention.

bit.body: Consistency is crucial. Algorithms reward consistency. The more consistent your activity, the more likely your posts will be moved to the top of feeds, gaining you more views and attention.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294553]
Therefore you need to set up a schedule and follow that to the letter, day in, day out. The daily routine is what creates familiarity.

bit.body: Therefore you need to set up a schedule and follow that to the letter, day in, day out. The daily routine is what creates familiarity.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294554]
There are multiple online tools that help you automate your social media posts and activity.

bit.body: There are multiple online tools that help you automate your social media posts and activity.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294555]
[%][%Connection]
You want to connect with the right people. Adding lots of people randomly has no value. Adding the right people to your target market does have immense value on the other hand.

bit.body: You want to connect with the right people. Adding lots of people randomly has no value. Adding the right people to your target market does have immense value on the other hand.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294556]
Network = net worth. It determines your level of influence and power in your community, both personally and professionally.

bit.body: Network = net worth. It determines your level of influence and power in your community, both personally and professionally.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294557]
You can enter places and get in front of the right people more quickly with the right connections. You advance in every conceivable way because of the people you know and how much they care about you.

bit.body: You can enter places and get in front of the right people more quickly with the right connections. You advance in every conceivable way because of the people you know and how much they care about you.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294558]
You instantly gain credibility when connections introduce or refer you to individuals within their network or organization.

bit.body: You instantly gain credibility when connections introduce or refer you to individuals within their network or organization.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294559]
[%][%Content Curation]
The main way you add value on social media is by creating educational content that establishes your authority, fosters familiarity, and positions you as a subject matter expert capable of resolving pertinent issues.

bit.body: The main way you add value on social media is by creating educational content that establishes your authority, fosters familiarity, and positions you as a subject matter expert capable of resolving pertinent issues.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294560]
As it is intensive to regularly publish your own valuable content, a great option is to leverage the content that is published by others.

bit.body: As it is intensive to regularly publish your own valuable content, a great option is to leverage the content that is published by others.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294561]
Basically, you establish yourself as an authority that gathers the most pertinent content for your audience and disseminates it via your various social media news feeds.

bit.body: Basically, you establish yourself as an authority that gathers the most pertinent content for your audience and disseminates it via your various social media news feeds.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294562]
There are a couple of aspects that you need (to do), to become that expert that people want to follow on their socials.

bit.body: There are a couple of aspects that you need (to do), to become that expert that people want to follow on their socials.

bitmark:
[.info:bitmark++]
[@id:294563]
• **Awareness:**	
You need to know what is going on in your market and industry. You want to be the first to know about Trends, Developments, Expectations and Competition. Follow platforms, connect with the right people, read blogs and newsletter and utilize Google Alert. Observe and listen carefully.

• **Sources:**
You need sources for constant content. Another reason to follow blogs, podcasts, Youtube channels, companies, people, newsletters and newspapers.

• **Intent:**
Avoid sharing things at random. It must be deliberate and support your marketing plan. Spend some time reading and comprehending the material you're sharing so that you can add commentary and insightful conclusions to the material you're sharing.

bit.body:
• **Awareness:**	
You need to know what is going on in your market and industry. You want to be the first to know about Trends, Developments, Expectations and Competition. Follow platforms, connect with the right people, read blogs and newsletter and utilize Google Alert. Observe and listen carefully.

• **Sources:**
You need sources for constant content. Another reason to follow blogs, podcasts, Youtube channels, companies, people, newsletters and newspapers.

• **Intent:**
Avoid sharing things at random. It must be deliberate and support your marketing plan. Spend some time reading and comprehending the material you're sharing so that you can add commentary and insightful conclusions to the material you're sharing.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294564]
[%][%Content Creation]
Original content is given more weight by social media algorithms, especially if it is posted natively. The term "native" refers to a post that doesn't contain a link to a website, podcast, article, etc.

bit.body: Original content is given more weight by social media algorithms, especially if it is posted natively. The term "native" refers to a post that doesn't contain a link to a website, podcast, article, etc.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294565]
There are several types of posts. Some examples are:

bit.body: There are several types of posts. Some examples are:

bitmark:
[.info:bitmark++]
[@id:294566]
• **Long posts:**
These are one-topic text posts of two to three paragraphs that contain no more than 175 words.

• **Articles:**
As the name says, articles. These do include links and also images.

• **Videos:**
Videos are rapidly growing in popularity. All major social media platforms capitalize on this trend, which is expected to keep growing.

bit.body:
• **Long posts:**
These are one-topic text posts of two to three paragraphs that contain no more than 175 words.

• **Articles:**
As the name says, articles. These do include links and also images.

• **Videos:**
Videos are rapidly growing in popularity. All major social media platforms capitalize on this trend, which is expected to keep growing.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294567]
By publishing original content that is relevant and valuable, you'll be able to convincingly position yourself as an authority in your field; which will encourage people to engage and as a result increasingly attract potential customers to you.

bit.body: By publishing original content that is relevant and valuable, you'll be able to convincingly position yourself as an authority in your field; which will encourage people to engage and as a result increasingly attract potential customers to you.

bitmark:
[.note:bitmark++]
[@id:294568]
Do you want to learn more strategies?

==LEARN MORE==|link:https://www.sensaletion.com/e-academy|

bit.body:
Do you want to learn more strategies?

==LEARN MORE==|link:https://www.sensaletion.com/e-academy|

bitmark:
[.chapter]
[@id:294569]
[▼ch-3]
[#Platform & Content Strategy]

[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294570]
If you are just starting out with social selling, start with one platform and expand it later (when you have the time and input).

bit.body: If you are just starting out with social selling, start with one platform and expand it later (when you have the time and input).

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294571]
It is, however, advisable to create an account on multiple platforms. While you do not have to actively communicate, it allows you to actively 'listen'. And you want to listen because by keeping your eyes and ears open, you get an understanding of whom to like, follow and connect to.

bit.body: It is, however, advisable to create an account on multiple platforms. While you do not have to actively communicate, it allows you to actively 'listen'. And you want to listen because by keeping your eyes and ears open, you get an understanding of whom to like, follow and connect to.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--&image]
[@id:294572]
[&image:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/bit-books/sensaletion/sensaletion_upsell/web-resources/images/sensaletion_upsell_3.png][@width:684]

[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294573]
You have to adapt to the target group and the platform on which you are present. Understanding why a customer is on a specific platform is crucial when building a relationship through that platform. What does the person want to see, hear and receive on the platform?

bit.body: You have to adapt to the target group and the platform on which you are present. Understanding why a customer is on a specific platform is crucial when building a relationship through that platform. What does the person want to see, hear and receive on the platform?

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294574]
If you want to build relationships, it is important to really immerse yourself in the customer. What are her interests? What is she paying attention to? What problems do my customers experience? Those are topics you need to communicate about.

bit.body: If you want to build relationships, it is important to really immerse yourself in the customer. What are her interests? What is she paying attention to? What problems do my customers experience? Those are topics you need to communicate about.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294575]
To build up your own content strategy, answer these questions:

bit.body: To build up your own content strategy, answer these questions:

bitmark:
[.info:bitmark++]
[@id:294576]
• What are hot items in this industry?
• What tips can I share?
• What inspires me and them too?
• What personal lessons can I share that will also benefit them?
• What is my view on developments in the industry?
• Why do I enjoy helping my customers so much?
• Which events do I visit about which I can tell something?
• What are the most common mistakes and how do you handle them?
• What is the difference between companies that are successful and others that continue to muddle along?
• Which apps are useful for my target group?
• Why did I make certain choices?
• What questions do I hear from my customers every day?
• What are my business success stories?
• How can I make the day of my target group just that little bit better?

bit.body:
• What are hot items in this industry?
• What tips can I share?
• What inspires me and them too?
• What personal lessons can I share that will also benefit them?
• What is my view on developments in the industry?
• Why do I enjoy helping my customers so much?
• Which events do I visit about which I can tell something?
• What are the most common mistakes and how do you handle them?
• What is the difference between companies that are successful and others that continue to muddle along?
• Which apps are useful for my target group?
• Why did I make certain choices?
• What questions do I hear from my customers every day?
• What are my business success stories?
• How can I make the day of my target group just that little bit better?

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294577]
These answers are ideal stories to communicate about.

bit.body: These answers are ideal stories to communicate about.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294578]
If you do this regularly and consistently, you will start getting noticed and increase the likeliness of becoming top of mind.

bit.body: If you do this regularly and consistently, you will start getting noticed and increase the likeliness of becoming top of mind.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294579]
It helps to think about which 'brand' you want to create for yourself. How do you want people to see you based on the content you share? Do you present yourself as an expert, inspirer, opinion leader, artist, or columnist?

bit.body: It helps to think about which 'brand' you want to create for yourself. How do you want people to see you based on the content you share? Do you present yourself as an expert, inspirer, opinion leader, artist, or columnist?

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294580]
When you can answer that, you can create a platform strategy that will be successful.

bit.body: When you can answer that, you can create a platform strategy that will be successful.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--&image]
[@id:294581]
[&image:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/bit-books/sensaletion/sensaletion_upsell/web-resources/images/sensaletion_upsell_4.png][@width:624]

[.chapter]
[@id:294582]
[▼ch-4]
[#Content Calendar]

[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294583]
A content calendar is a written schedule of when and where you plan to publish upcoming content.

bit.body: A content calendar is a written schedule of when and where you plan to publish upcoming content.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294584]
Social media content calendars typically coordinate when to post, plan the content to share, manage campaigns of multiple social posts, track deadlines, and review published content.

bit.body: Social media content calendars typically coordinate when to post, plan the content to share, manage campaigns of multiple social posts, track deadlines, and review published content.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294585]
As already mentioned, there are multiple online tools that help you automate your social media posts and activity.

bit.body: As already mentioned, there are multiple online tools that help you automate your social media posts and activity.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294586]
You already learned that posting randomly makes no sense. Therefore, you need to think about which subjects you want to publish and share and what the content of those subjects is.

bit.body: You already learned that posting randomly makes no sense. Therefore, you need to think about which subjects you want to publish and share and what the content of those subjects is.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294587]
It helps you develop a storyline, with varied themes that are relevant. This also allows you to zoom in on keywords. And do you want to include keywords in your header and main body? As that is another feature for algorithms to find you.

bit.body: It helps you develop a storyline, with varied themes that are relevant. This also allows you to zoom in on keywords. And do you want to include keywords in your header and main body? As that is another feature for algorithms to find you.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294588]
The answers to the questions outlined in the previous chapter provide you with a great place to start from.

bit.body: The answers to the questions outlined in the previous chapter provide you with a great place to start from.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294589]
The format in which you can post is varied, which is great because it is recommended to keep your posts formats vary. Find some that work well in your industry and you feel comfortable with and apply those.

bit.body: The format in which you can post is varied, which is great because it is recommended to keep your posts formats vary. Find some that work well in your industry and you feel comfortable with and apply those.

bitmark:
[.article:bitmark--]
[@id:294590]
Some of the options are:

bit.body: Some of the options are:

[.info:bitmark++]
[@id:294591]

How you post the content can also vary:

bit.body: How you post the content can also vary:
